.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx8_vdst_0ae2f9:

vdst
====

Instruction output: data read from a memory buffer and converted to 16-bit format.

*Size:* 1 dword.

*Operands:* :ref:`v<amdgpu_synid_v>`
